location.directions: Located near the main hospital complex, easily accessible from the highway

parking.instructions: Park in the designated clinic lot on the east side of the building

billing.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before appointment
billing.late_fee: $25 for appointments cancelled less than 2 hours before

first_visit: Bring valid ID and insurance card

policies.cancellation: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations within 2 hours of appointment time may incur a $25 fee.
policies.late_arrival: Patients arriving more than 15 minutes late may be rescheduled at the clinic's discretion.
policies.covid_protocol: Masks are optional. Hand sanitizer available at entrance. Please inform staff of any COVID-19 symptoms.
policies.privacy: All patient information is kept confidential in accordance with HIPAA regulations.

faq.question: What insurance do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept most major insurance providers including Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, Medicare, and Medicaid. We also accept self-pay patients.

faq.question: How do I reschedule my appointment?
faq.answer: You can reschedule by calling us at +1-555-123-4567 or through our online portal. Please provide at least 24 hours notice.

faq.question: What should I bring to my first visit?
faq.answer: Please bring a valid ID, insurance card, and any medical records from other providers. Arrive 15 minutes early to complete our medical history form.

faq.question: Do you have parking?
faq.answer: Yes, we have free parking available in our lot on the east side of the building.

faq.question: What are your business hours?
faq.answer: We are open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, and Saturday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. We are closed on Sundays.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations within 2 hours of appointment time may incur a $25 fee.

faq.question: How much does a consultation cost?
faq.answer: A general consultation costs $150. Follow-up visits are $75, physical exams are $200, and specialist consultations are $250.

faq.question: Do you offer telemedicine appointments?
faq.answer: Currently, we only offer in-person appointments. Please contact us for more information about future telemedicine options.
